summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeHOURGLASS Luminous Glow Foundation is a high-performance foundation featuring SPF 30, advanced skincare and medium, buildable coverage for an unbelievably luminous glow.
details: DetailsFeaturesSPF 30 helps protect skin from sun damageDefends against early signs of agingMaintains a healthy-looking complexionVisibly smooths, intensely moisturizes, and hydrates skinClinically proven to visibly reduce fine lines and wrinklesImproves skin tone and texture12-hour wear*Transfer- and crease-resistantDoesn't settle into fine linesDoesn't oxidize throughout the day *Claim cannot be linked to SPF protection.Research ResultsPROVEN RESULTSClinically proven to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.INSTANT93% said this product instantly evens out skin tone and reduces the look of imperfections93% said skin instantly looks and feels smoother93% said skin instantly feels moisturizedAFTER 12 HOURS93% said skin looks smoother and healthier all day93% said this product didn't transfer90% said this product didn't crease or look cakeyAFTER TWO WEEKS100% said skin feels more moisturized93% said skin texture is more refined and skin looks healthier90% said skin tone looks more even and texture is improvedFormulated WithoutAlcoholParabensPhthalatesTalcMineral oilSulfatesGlutenItem 2637824How To UseApply a pea-sized amount of foundation to the center of the face and blend outward using a brush. Gently buff into skin using Ambient Soft Glow Foundation Brush and build until desired level of coverage is achieved.IngredientsActive: Avobenzone 3.0%, Homosalate 7.34%, Octisalate 5.0%. Inactive: Water/Aqua, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Coconut Alkanes, Dimethicone, Tribehenin, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Dicaprylyl Ether, Cetyl Alcohol, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Silica, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Octyldodecyl Neopentanoate, Sodium Chloride, Sorbitan Oleate, Lauryl Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate, Dimethicone/Polyglycerin-3 Crosspolymer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Caprylyl Glycol, Vp/Eicosene Copolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Glyceryl Dibehenate, Aluminum Dimyristate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Citric Acid, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Glyceryl Behenate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Butylene Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Methyl Salicylate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol, Hexylene Glycol, Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of our commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a pea-sized amount of foundation to the center of the face and blend outward using a brush. Gently buff into skin using Ambient Soft Glow Foundation Brush and build until desired level of coverage is achieved.

reviews.headline: I am in love!!
reviews.comments: I was looking for a skin tint and came across this product which I am aware is a foundation. The online shade match was a miss but I saw these puppies in person. Was able to find my shade. The Ulta I went to was in full stock. I used it today, and the foundation is the PERFECT match to my skin tone. The formula itself made me question if it will work but further blending with my sponge made it more easily blendable. I've now worn this for 9 hours and not one touch up, not patchy, not greasy. My skin took this product very well. This is my new favorite product!!! My skin is combo. Like, its not greasy but also not dry.

reviews.headline: Too thick, and sloughs off easily
reviews.comments: This was a great foundation, but only stayed looking nice within an hour after application. After that- no matter how much spray or powder I put, the foundation started to slough off. It wasn't for me, but that's my personal opinion!

reviews.headline: Better than many foundations
reviews.comments: I've tried sonmany foundations and skin tints and like this one the best.  I live in a warm climate so I prefer something that is lighter to medium coverage.  This foundation is definitely medium coverage, but doesn't feel too cakey.  As many other users said, a little goes a long way, and it is easy to apply evenly.  My only "complaint" is that the finish is a bit more dewy/oily than I would prefer.  I don't love using a setting powder because I have dry/mature skin, but I find that I need to use some powder to cover the shiny appearance from this foundation.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Over Drying --- Not for Dry Skin

reviews.headline: Long lasting
reviews.comments: I was gifted this product in exchange for an honest opinion complimentary from Hourglass beauty. As with most Hourglass products, this foundation did not disappoint. It's definitely on a thicker side, but still blend out seamlessly. There's a slight glow but nothing to crazy. I feels like the foundation barely oxidize on me even after hours of wear.

reviews.headline: Looks great in any lighting situation!
reviews.comments: Natural skin finish no makeup look. A little goes a long way. Stays fresh and doesnt get flat at the end of the day. I use my finger tips to apply. When I glance in the mirror throughout the day Im pleasantly surprised that it looks good in a variety of lighting. Thats an amazing feature for a foundation! And it has SPF 30.  Perfect Id say.

reviews.headline: I will buy this product again!
reviews.comments: Love the coverage of this product and it's so light weight. Will definitely buy this again!

reviews.headline: Not for me!
reviews.comments: Definitely not worth all the hype for me! I have oily face as it is and this foundation makes my face worse ive tried everyting setting my face, primer, serting spray. It still will come rigt off. Very disapointed.

reviews.headline: Absolutely missed the mark. So disappointed
reviews.comments: Purchased this because the level 2 matches my skin tone really well. That's the only pro. Makes my face look like a mirror with shine when I'm usually very normal skin. Also sticks to any hair or dry skin and makes it look bumpy.

reviews.headline: Perfect match
reviews.comments: I love all Hourglass foundations but this one has to the easiest for me to wear. Its long lasting and wears better throught the day- very MUF matte type foundation. Looks very natural and skin like when applied correctly.

reviews.headline: Like it!
reviews.comments: I wasn't sure at first if there was enough "glow" but I ended up liking this product. I think there are products that work just as well that are less expensive.

reviews.headline: Where is the glow?
reviews.comments: It's wild that for $7 more, you could just get a bottle of Chanel Les Beiges foundation. Chanel! Spf is foundation is nice in theory but I'd rather apply sunscreen all over my face, ears and neck and then do my foundation. I had sworn off Hourglass because it's trash but their packaging sucked me in. As usual, their shades are horrendous. My closest match is 5 but it was still too dark and I'm not even fair. Their warm shades are always too yellow. The foundation is thick, doesn't apply well and there is no glow. In fact, it looked dry. I returned and bought myself a bottle of a Chanel foundation.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: My face breaks out easily, its also combo skin but this keeps it perfectly hydrated yet gives me just the right amount of coverage without it being too caked on. Light and airy, laats all day and looks beautiful on. Gives the clean girl vibes.

reviews.headline: My new holy grail
reviews.comments: I saw this launch this week in stores and wanted to try to find a new favorite foundation. I have combo oil skin and am very pale and the lightest shade is my perfect match. A little goes a long way and it applies beautifully with a brush plus I love that it has spf. It has a nice thick yet creamy texture and doesnt cling to my drier patches. The real reason I fell in love is because my t zone wasnt super oily at the end of the day, something that happens with every other foundation I've used. It stayed beautiful and didn't crease. I also love that the coverage is buildable from a true medium coverage all the way to full coverage in the areas I need it. This is my new holy grail and I'll be recommending it to all my friends. Truly the best new luxury foundation.

reviews.headline: Like it
reviews.comments: Its s pretty good foundation. It's not super thick so it doesn't accentuate the wrinkles. I like how it's medium coverage so I don't feel like I'm trying too hard.

reviews.headline: My perfect wedding foundation!
reviews.comments: I tried 15+ foundations from drugstore to high end leading up to my wedding and could not find anything that didnt cling to my stubborn dry patches. I tried this foundation one week before my wedding as my final attempt to find something. From the first day I tried it, i got compliments and the dry patches were at least 95% hidden. This was my wedding foundation and it applied so beautifully with a brush and lasted 16 hours (with primer and setting spray). Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: Color was nice. Not as spreadable as Bare Minerals. I gave it a try but it's not for me

reviews.headline: Beautiful foundation
reviews.comments: It took me a a few times wearing this to really fall in love with it, but it really is a beautiful foundation. The coverage is on the lighter side but I like that as i prefer to wear skin tints on a daily basis. This foundation makes your skin look lit from within. Its so smooth too and never looks cakey. I really like the Ambient foundation from Hourglass but I think I like this one even better.

reviews.headline: Non incentivized review here
reviews.comments: If you like a good lightweight foundation then try this. Everytime I wear this I am told that my skin is "glowing." Provides coverage witout a heavy cakey feeling.

reviews.headline: Its okay
reviews.comments: I have combo skin with no breakouts. As soon as I set this with powder it looks okay. The very minute my pores open or oil pushes it breaks apart and looks absolutely awful. It's okay for very light makeup days but anything more than that its game over. Regularly use Smashbox Halo and I think that one is far better. It's a rare miss from Hourglass for me, usually their products are amazing. Also was verrrry separated when it arrived and I grew another bicep shaking it to get it to mix again.

media.headline: Loving this foundation and sunscreen combo
Great Buildable Medium Coverage And Radiant Finish

media.headline: Perfect everyday foundation for dry skin!
media.caption: Product Packaging

faceoff_positive.comments: This foundation formula was actually SUPRISINGLY very full-coverage considering it has spf in it. The texture is very thick and a little goes a long way. I will say because of the spf you probably don't want to be putting it too close to your eyes if they are sensitive like mine but that's literally the only thing I could even "criticize" about this foundation which really isn't even a criticisms but more so something to consider. What's interesting is I often struggle with finding foundations that are actually light enough to match my neck but this foundation was actually my perfect match! Although this foundation is more full coverage than I was expecting I meant that for an spf it's SUPRISINGLY full coverage but also it still will allow some of my freckles to show which I like and the thing is that if I want more coverage one day I can always just build this foundation up anyways so it's very versatile. I love how it neutralizes my redness but also still shows my freckles because my aim isn't to cover those but just the redness and usually when you cover one you have to cover the other. This is by far my favorite foundation out of my collection! I highly recommend it especially to my super pale girls! Another thing to note is this does have a scent that just smells like spf so if that bothers you just know that! Gifted by hourglasscosmetics
faceoff_positive.headline: Versatile Foundation

faceoff_negative.comments:
⭐️I received this Illusion Luminous Glow Foundation with SPF 30 Complimentary from HourGlass Cosmetics in exchange for my honest review. 

I unfortunately was not a big fan of this product. First the shade I chose that would normally be a perfect match was too orange. I do like makeup that adds skincare benefits in it, but it didn't feel very hydrating on my face. It felt very thick and was actually hard to blend in. I had to use a damp beauty blender just to get it to fully blend. It left it kind of patchy, and not smooth. Has the day went on, I noticed creasing, even with using a primer and setting spray. This could also be due to the fact that my combo skin has been leaning very dry lately due to the cold weather. It does have a sunscreen smell to it, but that didn't bother me. I did like that it has SPF in it, so it took out the extra step of having to apply it before my makeup application. It is described as a foundation that reduces fine lines & wrinkles. I personally wouldn't consider this a foundation as it didn't cover up any imperfections. I'd consider this more of a skin tint. I was a huge fan of the previous HourGlass skin tint that is discontinued. I thought this would be comparable, but it wasn't as good, and wish they brought that back. I will say it is in very nice packaging, that makes it easy to apply. And the gold color is very pretty. This may work for you if you have oily/combo skin. I'm going to try again when it's warmer outside & my skin isn't as dry.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for me unfortunately
